summary: This is an email chain from August 10, 2019, discussing the death of Jeffrey Epstein in federal custody. It mentions ongoing investigations by the Attorney General and FBI, and notes the lack of information on the cause of death and Epstein's status at the time. The email includes an attached letter from the warden and a press release from the Bureau of Prisons.

persons.name: Michael Miller
persons.context: Addressed as 'Mike' in the email chain, appears to be a legal professional involved in the Epstein case, receiving updates on Epstein's death and investigations.

events.title: Email correspondence on Epstein's death
events.description: Email chain discussing the death of Jeffrey Epstein in federal custody, ongoing investigations by the Attorney General and FBI, and the lack of information on cause of death.

events.title: Investigation into Epstein's death initiated
events.description: The Attorney General and FBI have initiated investigations into the death of Jeffrey Epstein while in federal custody.

keyFacts: The email confirms Jeffrey Epstein died in federal custody, with investigations into his death initiated by the Attorney General and FBI.
There is a noted lack of information on the apparent cause of death and the status of observation of Epstein at the time of his death.
The correspondence includes an attached letter from the warden and a press release from the Bureau of Prisons (BOP) regarding Epstein's death.
